item.title: Github Pages Site Blog ' Set Up
item.author: Author
item.description: 框架选择 Hugo About Hugo Github pages Creating a GitHub Pages site About GitHub Pages Changing the visibility of your GitHub Pages site Example 使用 Hugo + Github 搭建个人博客 Hugo系列(1) - 简单搭建教程与远程部署 ubuntu搭建hugo博客环境 个人博客的创建之路1：hugo 搭建个人博客 主题选择 Hugo Themes LoveIt Theme 当前的博客主题采用LoveIt主题模板进行搭建的，可以参考LoveIt官方提供的搭建方案，LoveIt提供了丰富的可配置选项。 当前列出 LoveIt 主题的内容链接，方便查看: LoveIt 主题文档 - 基本概念 主题文档 - 内容 主题文档 - 内置 Shortcodes 主题文档 - 扩展 Shortcodes Markdown 基本语法 Emoji 支持 主题修改(自定义样式) ​ 参照 雨临Lewis 所发表的系列博客

item.title: strategy
item.author: Author
item.description: Strategy (from Greek στρατηγία stratēgia, "art of troop leader; office of general, command, generalship"[1]) is a general plan to achieve one or more long-term or overall goals under conditions of uncertainty. In the sense of the "art of the general", which included several subsets of skills including military tactics, siegecraft, logistics etc., the term came into use in the 6th century C.E. in Eastern Roman terminology, and was translated into Western vernacular languages only in the 18th century.
